name: The Mountain Climb
description:
*Requires HTC Vive*

The Mountain Climb is a relaxing virtual reality mountain climbing game. Use the side grip buttons on the Vive controllers to grab onto rocks, trees and other wooden objects. Throw yourself off ledges to get to the next obstacle. Climb the mountain! Collect the star!

Note! If you get motion sick from climbing or falling experiences, this might not be for you. Also a caution if you are afraid of heights.

The Mountain Climb launches in early access on itch.io at 75% completion. There are still a few bugs involving falling through the terrain, but It can be played from start to finish. The game is currently about 20 minutes long, depending on skill level.

*Update 1 - Music added! Thanks to Derek Weiand for the music
